description.zh: Cusdis 是一个开源、轻量且注重隐私的 Disqus 替代方案。它提供了一个极简且可嵌入的评论系统，专为静态博客等小型网站设计。项目强调数据自主权、极简主义和易集成性。
description.en: Cusdis is an open-source, lightweight, and privacy-friendly alternative to Disqus. It provides a minimalist and embeddable comment system tailored for small websites like static blogs. The project emphasizes data ownership, minimalism, and ease of integration.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 开源且支持自托管，用户完全掌控数据
- 评论组件轻量（压缩后约5KB）
- 无需用户登录即可评论，无 Cookie 使用
- 注重隐私保护

## 功能列表:

- 支持国际化和暗色模式的轻量评论组件
- 邮件通知
- Webhook 支持
- 易于自托管
- 多种集成支持
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Open-source and self-hostable, giving users full data control
- Lightweight comment widget (~5kb gzip)
- No cookies or mandatory user sign-ins required
- Privacy-friendly design

## Features:

- Lightweight comment widget with i18n and dark mode
- Email notification
- Webhook support
- Easy to self-host
- Many integrations
